div.p:
kō-vicaiya-nantivikkirama-parumaṟku yā
ṇṭ’ aṟupattiraṇṭāvatu sakala-jagatra
yābhivandita-surāsurādhīśa-parameśvara-prati
hārikṛta-mahāvali-kulot·bhava-śrī-māvalivāṇarāyar
vaṭukavaḻi paṉṉīrrāyiramum Āḻa vāṇapurattu
vaṭa-cikara-kōyil putukkuvittu Itaṟku Iḷaṅ-
kiḻavar makaṉ maṉṟāṭiṭai Aḻiñciṟka[ḷam] paṭṭi [vi]laikku
koṇṭu kuṭuttēṉ U[ṟ]ṟukkāṭṭu-kōṭṭattu [A]ḷiṅkaṇa-pā[kka*]ttu
kīḻakattu taṭṭāṉ mā[ta]n makan [A]ritīraṉ kuṭutta tēvar pōkam
mahāvalivāṇarāyar piṭākai valañ-ceytu koṭuttār Itu kāt-
tā[r A]ṭi[[yeṇ muṭi mē]]laṉa Itu Aḻittāṉ kaṭikai [E]ḻā Iru[va]raiyum
ko[ṉṟa p][āvattu] [pa]ṭuvāṉ Itu Aḻi[t]tāṉ Ippāvattu[k*]ku Añcāṉāyil
[Aṉ] . . [[fn3]] kōyilu[k*]ku Āyiram kā[ṇam] [ta]ṇṭappaṭuvom vāṇapuratto[m]

va[hu]bhir· vasudhā dattā rāja[bh]iḥ [[fn5]] sakaradibhiḥ yasya yasya yadā bhū
mi [[fn6]] tasya tasya tadā phalam·
